location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, to Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government at Bombay

mods.abstract: Letter acknowledging receipt of letter of 14 April 1815 regarding Nawab Abbas Koly [Quli] Khan who was robbed by Joasemee [Qasimi] pirates. Bruce reports that he has received a list of lost property from Nawab Abbas Koly Khan and has written to Hassan ben Rehma [Sheikh al-Hasan bin Rahma al'Qasimi], Chief of the Qasimi.
